property.name: Race
property.value: Metallica/Team Ginga

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Whenever a card is added to your shields, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMEX-11 W-Team Docking Pack: Team Ginga and Team Bomber

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put a non-evolution Light dragon creature that costs 7 or less from your hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMEX-11 W-Team Docking Pack: Team Ginga and Team Bomber

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, ignore any of your creature’s effects that would prevent them from attacking your opponent. (For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players". Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMEX-11 W-Team Docking Pack: Team Ginga and Team Bomber

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Until the end of your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Draw a card.

{SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {GALAXYSHIELD} {W4} (You may pay Water 4 instead of the cost of using this card. ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Sympathy: Creature that costs 3 or less (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures that cost 3 or less in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your creatures that cost 3 or less is destroyed, untap this creature. ■ Whenever one of your creatures that cost 4 or more would be destroyed, you may destroy one of your creatures that cost 3 or less instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMEX-11 W-Team Docking Pack: Team Ginga and Team Bomber

property.name: Race
property.value: Red Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your Dragons attack, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. ■ When you would lose the game, or your opponent would win the game, destroy this creature instead. ■ When this creature is destroyed, this turn, you can't lose the game and your opponent can't win.

You may put a creature that costs 4 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.)
